main event: Fourteen round objects were observed flying in formation over Highland, North Carolina on September 14, 1956.
interesting points: The objects were described as being the size of a grapefruit and varying in color from yellow to deep red,The sighting lasted for approximately 1.5 hours,The objects moved from southwest to northeast and performed swooping maneuvers,There were indications of additional witnesses, but information was derived from a single source,The report concluded the objects may have been balloons or aircraft, but was classified as unidentified.
sighted object: fourteen round objects in the sky
witness description: A policeman from Highland, North Carolina
